meanings.definition: A person who overreaches in ambition or effort.
meanings.sent1: The overreacher in the office always takes on more projects than they can handle.
meanings.sent2: She was known as an overreacher for constantly setting unrealistic goals for herself.
meanings.sent3: The overreacher decided to climb Mount Everest on their first hiking trip.
meanings.sent4: He was an overreacher in the world of finance, always aiming for risky investments.
meanings.sent5: The overreacher's determination to succeed knew no bounds.

meanings.definition: To overreach in ambition or effort.
meanings.sent1: Don't overreacher by trying to finish all your homework in one night.
meanings.sent2: She tends to overreacher by taking on too many responsibilities at once.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally overreachered by signing up for two marathons on the same day.
meanings.sent4: The company overreachered in their expansion plans and ended up in financial trouble.
meanings.sent5: It's important not to overreacher beyond your capabilities to avoid burnout.
